On #EACMonetaryUnion: We need to learn from history. The 1st EAC which collapsed in 1977 started crumbling at the monetary union stage.
On #EACMonetaryUnion That happened when each of the founding states decided to part ways from a joint currency to their individual shillings
On #EACMonetaryUnion We have teams of negotiators investigating what exactly went wrong during the maiden #EACMonetaryUnion plans.
On #EACMonetaryUnion A thorough investigation will then help the current EAC to iron out flaws before a 2nd attempt in the same direction.
On #EACMonetaryUnion We both understand that we need it for our region and we all have to delicately address the matter to avoid mistakes.

Today we will enact the law of voluntary and binding primaries, for the election of candidates for president, parliamentarians and mayors
The primaries were a commitment of our campaign. They will strengthen democracy, participation and the quality of politics.
With the primaries, the voice of the people will be heard loud and clear in the selection of the candidates that will represent it.
On June 30, 2013 primary elections regulated by law will be held for the first time. That day will be a historic day for Chile.

The president in an interview on the Egyptian Channel 1 and the Nile and Egyptian satellite channel and some special channels
Revolution has done without the preference of an external state on us and without the preferred faction on a faction, but the will of all Egyptians # President
The Constitutional Declaration is not the first in the extraordinary transitional phase that we want to move quickly
The latest constitutional declaration fulfills the wishes and requirements of the phase in which we are # president
The Constitutional Declaration stipulates that all constitutional declarations will end once the people vote on the new constitution
The scene now is a healthy and positive scene and I am very happy that the supporter says his opinion and the exhibitions say banner and bear the responsibility of the decision # president

I dare to see who was corrupt in the former regime is being recruited in the middle of the revolutionaries and trying to show that he is more keen on the revolution than the revolutionaries # President
The blood of martyrs in my neck and we have a fact-finding committee gathered evidence and new evidence emerged and the trials will be re-established by the rules of law # President

The Constitutional Declaration is an investigation of the desire of the revolutionaries and an expression of a general Egyptian situation that wants to see the offender take his punishment # President
We are talking about the will of a people who chose a president who bears responsibility for the people who live in his midst and is keen that all procedures are legal and correct.

The constitutional declaration is an interim measure for a limited period that ends after the vote on the constitution. If the people do not agree with it, we will form another committee to be rewritten by the president

The dismissal of the Attorney-General came in response to the demands of the revolutionaries, and this was not disputed by anyone and delayed a bit, but now it is no longer likely to be delayed more than this
This announcement is enough tools to preserve the institutions of the homeland until the new constitution comes out # President
I respect the judiciary and keen on it and the independence of its role is the rule according to law and not legislation # President
Has nothing to do with the elimination of politics and they are immune to any kind of political dispute because the judge's judgment and the sanctity of the government is very important
Guatemala will abstain from voting in the #ONU in the case of Palestine. http://t.co/ceQenyZ7
Supporters and dissidents have the same appreciation and respect for me and my responsibility to preserve Egypt until its institutions are completed
My responsibility is to achieve justice and law, to respect the judgments and to lay down important rules in the absence of the People's Assembly
There are 22 cases of graft, 24 cases of public funds and five cases before the Public Prosecution
When I have information and feel that there is a danger to the home must enter and performed a very accurate surgery # President
I have information as head of state and sent to many who know themselves that they may commit legal irregularities that may harm the president's home
The ordinary citizen must live a dignified living stable # president
The origin of the night by day until the institutions of the state stand on its feet and its role in parallel and not respectively # President
I met with all the political forces last month, and everyone has been consulted, but I am the one who will take the decision and take responsibility for it
People are not objecting to advertising as a principle but there are some objections to some details # President
We open 35 huge projects very soon # President
I can not use individual powers as elected president to suppress the people and this is impossible to happen
I reject a word of reassurance to Egyptian Christians because they are patriots and the citizen is not described as a minority
The revolution was for freedom, to live and without freedom to live without value, and to live without freedom is not necessary
We all want a better life but how a better life comes without producing a president
Demonstrations are important in order to have a politically stable society and we want to be productive as well
I will not allow anyone to lengthen one of the transitional stages or take advantage of certain circumstances to shake the situation of the country
The Egyptian people in the darkest conditions did not accept violently and the laws were found to deal with abuses and when any one practiced violence then the law intervenes
Putting the constitution to the referendum is a sovereign act # President
The loan is a transit certificate and I will not allow anyone to intervene in the affairs of the country. I opposed this before and if the loan is returned to the people, we will not take it.
I suffered for the judges in 2006 and was arrested for seven months and can not be divided by the judiciary and the judges' sentences that are not respected in the past era.
I maintain the judiciary and all its provisions, and I want the judiciary and its rulings not to be subject to argument
Ali is very proud to see a general assembly of judges, including those who are not the president

We are very interested in the development of Sinai and we will put 65 thousand feddans ready for agriculture and there are projects for the establishment of a cement factory and self-fertilizer plant and coal mines # President
I do not allow the police to assault anyone and ask citizens to cooperate with the police
There is no room for tampering with any party either from the supporters or opponents # President
I see the will of the people
Good in tomorrow from God and with the will of this people # President
